analysis.description:
KratosToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#540-546) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timelockTimestamp > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#543-546)

KratosToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#546-551) uses timestamp for comparisons

KratosToken.enableTimelock (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#513-518) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timelockTimestamp == 0 || _timelockTimestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#516-517)

KratosToken._addTimelock (/unique_chucks/2/0x6560a9b6436e129cf835ab9da96201207facd4f8.sol#528-534) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
